name: Hell Inspector's Mod of Stupidity
summary: Hell Inspector's Mod of Stupidity is a mod for The Simpsons: Hit & Run that brings in numerous media properties for one very odd crossover featuring twelve new missions, four fully animated cutscenes, six unlockable cars, three unlockable costumes, and a dozen-odd character interactions.
